page.title: 18FAVOURITE SPORTS
page.content: We learnt about the{sports}that children like in{our school.}The {favourite sport}we like is{swimming. Fifty five children like the sport. The{least popular}ones are matball and rugby. Only one person likes the best. {Football}surprised us when it came second. We thought it would have come first because it is a popular sport. There were{thirteen sports}and we made graphs and pie charts. Class one chose six sports.{Swimming}was the{most {popular.}In Class two swimming was, yet again, most popular, but football and tennis came second, not last. In Class three swimming was the favourite.{Ice Skating}and{football} came second. In Class four more than half of the class like swimming. Four children share snooker and roller skating.{Athletics}comes{third.}Darren and I like snooker and tennis.
